org.lightsleep.entity

Interface PreInsert


  • public interface PreInsert
    If an entity class implements this interface, insert method of Sql class calls preInsert method of the entity class before executing INSERT SQL.
    In preInsert method, do the implementation of the numbering of the primary key or etc.
    Example
     public class Contact implements PreInsert {
   @Key public int id;
     ...

   @Override
   public int preInsert(Connection connection) {
     // Numbering of ID before INSERT
     id = NextId.getNewId(connection, Contact.class);
     return 0;
   }
 }
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int preInsert(java.sql.Connection connection)
      This method is execute before executing INSERT SQL.

    • Method Detail

      • preInsert

        int preInsert(java.sql.Connection connection)
        This method is execute before executing INSERT SQL.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection
        Returns:
        the number of inserted rows
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if connection is null
